t: Amazon.com : Lone Wolf Assault II Hang On Tree Stand : Hunting Tree Stands : Sports & Outdoors
s: The Assault II Hang On treestand is the leanest of the light weight hang on treestands in the Lone Wolf pack. Weighing in at a mere 11-pounds the Assault's 26" x 19.5" platform provides plenty of room to maneuver, while still promising to fit in the nastiest trees you'll find.
